website_summaries.verdict: The wool interior of the OluKai Moloa Slipper makes it the go-to shoe when the weather starts getting colder. Its waxed top ensures the inside doesn’t get soaked when you stepped out in the snow. Despite some complaints about the stinky insole, this slip-on walking shoe comes highly recommended, especially during the cold season.
pros: A majority of people feel comfortable wearing the OluKai Moloa Slipper for lounging in the house
Many users are satisfied with the durability of this walking shoe
A lot of owners are impressed that this model uses quality materials
The arch support is deemed sufficient by a good number of reviewers
Multiple folks have claimed that this product relieved pain caused by plantar fasciitis and other foot and ankle problems
A bunch of individuals appreciate the warmth delivered by this footgear
The rustic style of the merchandise appeals to numerous shoppers
cons: Some owners gripe that the insole developed an awful stink when used without socks
The Moloa Slipper is not grippy on icy pavements, says a commenter

customer_reviews.title: Olukai is the best
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of olukai sandals and slip ons. I'm consistently impressed with the quality, comfort and support. The support is amazing in their sandals. So when I saw this slipper I bought it instantly. Another great olukai product. My only room for improvement is nonhalf sizes. I'm an 11.5 and find the 12s way top big but the 11s just a little short but doable. I buy the 11, but my toes do touch the end.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo potsdam

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE with comfy arch support- great for bad backs and foot problems!
customer_reviews.text: By husband works from home and has minor back problems and his feet are always sore- realized he was shuffling around in flat as a board slippers from a different company and thought these would help- they TOTALLY HELPED with his back pain and the arch support is WONDERFUL. So comfy and well made and his feet no longer ache at the end of the days he wears there. Thank you!! These are the perfect husband gift
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marathakis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. High quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. I lost one of my originals when I left them on the roof of my car. These are the most comfortable slippers I've ever worn. I have severe neuropathy in my feet and these slippers offer the support and comfort I need. They are also very high quality my first pair were two years old and showed little sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: PMdoit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality, durable and comfortable. The best slippers out there.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my husband after discovering these wonderful slippers for myself after a lot of online research. He is very picky and I'm happy to say he loves them as much as I love mine. They are extremely well made, so very comfortable, providing great orthotic support, while also being warm and cuddly. They can be worn outside for a quick trip out to the back yard with the pups, and my husband loves the fold-down feature of the heel, as he tends to like wearing mules. My husband has had some foot issues, and these have helped. All in all, a very successful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth in Columbus

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift for my son in law
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my son in law every year for Christmas. He changes into them whenever he is home, rain or shine. I bought him a different brand one year and he asked for me to change back to the original Olukai. I try to vary the color from year to year but he loves these. He leaves the backs down so he can "slip" into them. They are attractive enough to wear out to the store etc. I noticed that my IT guy wears them for his regular shoes too. He said its all he buys. Highly recommend, they guys seem to like them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers EVER!
customer_reviews.text: For years searching for the very best men's slippers has been a bit of a "chase" for my sons and me. A "standard" Christmas gift for years was a pair to "one-up" last year's slippers. I don't think there's a pair of higher-end legit functional, not "decorative," that I've not had and these are the best ever, seriously. This slipper follows the basic form of an Olukai shoe, the Nohea Mesh, that I own and very much like to begin with. As a slipper, it's a total win.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable slippers EVER
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are a perfect fit, so comfortable I forget I have them on , but with great soles so when I need to go outside they offer practical protection. Best part is the convenience of the fold down heels so I can use them as easy to put on scuffs. Great in the middle of the night. I have a pair of OLUKAI shoes recommended by a woman who's husband has 3 pair. The shoes, like the slippers are my favorites. Both are the best quality and comfort possible.
customer_reviews.author: Bill - Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Expensive Slippers, but Also My Favorite Ever
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I spent so much money on just slippers, but these might be worth it. These are by far the most comfortable slippers I have ever worn. Very warm and comfy, and feel exceptionally well made. Have been fine enough to take the dog out, but I'm not sure I'll wear them outside much more than that, they seem too nice to get roughed up.
customer_reviews.author: kstate27

customer_reviews.title: The best slipper ever made
customer_reviews.text: My husband has neuropathy and these slippers are amazing! They fit perfectly and are sturdy enough to wear outside of the house yet very soft on the inside. They are structured enough that his feet are well supported. The back is designed to fold down if you want to just slide them on without ruining them. They would be even better if they were dog proof! He is on his 3rd pair in a year because our sons dog will move heaven and earth to get to them. I’m sure that they would last for years with regular wear. The leather is thick and the stitching is perfect
customer_reviews.author: V Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome slipper. I love them and they are the most comfortable slipper I have ever owned. I have tried to buy another pair in my size of 14 so when these wear out in a year or two I got a new pair but seems like that size is out and hasn’t come back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Get them if you can decide on a color!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. My favorite shoes now. Only had them for a week, but I never want to leave the house again! Even tho you could wear them out and about moderately. I have no complaints. Exactly what I was looking for. I chose the onyx pair in nubuck.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Never Had to Take Them Off!
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers! Well worth the extra investment to get a high quality slipper like this. The removable sole is washable and comfortable, and the slipper doesn’t wear “too hot” like almost every other slipper I’ve owned. I hate having to take these off to put real shoes on!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice fit, well made
customer_reviews.text: There is a definite difference between these and the cheapos. Very nice firm fit so they do not slide off your feet while in slip-on mode, and super comfort in either slip-on mode or heel-up mode. Worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: R9

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I enjoy wearing them and like the way they look. They do look a bit like house shoes, so occasionally someone will hustle me about it (but I aint tryn to hear dat).
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Lax

customer_reviews.title: I had previously purchased a pair of their loafer shoes at a store and fell in love with them (in fact I ordered another pair fr
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a find. I've been wearing Minnetonka Moccasins forever, but I think I'm now a convert to OulKai. I had previously purchased a pair of their loafer shoes at a store and fell in love with them (in fact I ordered another pair from Amazon...different color). I also wear the OulKai flip flops in the summer. This company is on to something. They make fantastic footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these but hated them
customer_reviews.text: They look great but killed my feet shortly after just walking around the house I normally wear cheap sanuk shoes and wanted to try some more expensive foot ware but had to ship them back right away as i just hated the way they feel
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable/great slipper
customer_reviews.text: A excellent quality slipper. Very comfortable and well made. Love them. Not as "plush" as an UGG, I find them as comfortable, if not a little more comfortable. Ordered a second pair and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: knifemaker

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers Ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son for Christmas. He is a long standing Ugg supporter but I jumped ship because of the reviews and because the heel can be down or up without ruining the backs of the slippers like he has his Uggs. I thought it was going to be a hard sell but he LOVES them. Will buy these again for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loved them. Total hit!! Got a size 11 and he wears a 10.5 and he says that they fit well and that they aren't too big.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia

customer_reviews.title: great slippers, extremely warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers, I can only wear them for a couple of hours at a time because they are so warm that they start to make my feet sweat. they are super comfortable and are well crafted. I have two other pairs of olukai shoes and their customer service has been great whenever there have been any issues with their products. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kachmar

customer_reviews.title: Thin lining...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the more traditional shearling slippers, the fleece in these is very thin and provide a minimum amount of comfort. I've wanted to try these for yrs so at least I satisfied my curiosity....
customer_reviews.author: i_taz

customer_reviews.title: and I love that the back can fold down you can just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I ever bought of this brand and they are incredible. I went out and bought 2 paris of shoes from them after having these slippers. Sure they're expensive, but they are quality, and I would rather pay more for quality every time. I have had several expensive brands of slippers before and they weren't that warm or durable etc. These have been very durable the warmest slippers, and I love that the back can fold down you can just slide them on or you can have the back up to have them be more like a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BeardRN

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Quality leather, real sheepskin lining, supportive insole, quality workmanship, and a flexible construction that should fit most foot shapes. Perfect as a house slipper, but they are stylish enough for errands around town and surprisingly warm in sub-freezing temperatures, though only suitable for dry conditions. Addictively comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: ExRxIT

customer_reviews.title: Olukai Moloa believer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Traditionally a UGG Byron slipper enthusiast, as UGG models changed I ordered the Olukai Moloa slipper in a 9 and to me they fit dead on. I slipped them on and haven't looked back since, these slippers are the best. Love the way they are set up to be worn as a open back clog. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Chagrin

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper
customer_reviews.text: A excellent quality slipper. Very comfortable and well made. Love them. Not as "plush" as an UGG, I find them as comfortable, if not a little more comfortable. Ordered a second pair and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: knifemaker

customer_reviews.title: Super nice slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice slippers. You can slip into them with the heal folded over or step into them like a shoe. I really like that they have a nice sole so you can wear them outside. I’ve accidentally worn them out to run errands before and didn’t realize until half way through. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as plush or as comfy as expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m use to wearing similar slippers from Uggs. These weren’t nearly as plush or comfortable. The lining was rather thin. I do like that the liners are removable for washing and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Lee Gull

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, look great and rubber bottoms don’t slip on carpeted stairs. These are my second pair. First pair still look and feel great, but soles have gotten smooth and now slip.
customer_reviews.author: PCH66

customer_reviews.title: Well made very warm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, almost to warm at times, well made. Good / warm enough to walk outside in
customer_reviews.author: Half Baked

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable slipper that can be worn indoors and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He has multiple pairs of OluKai shoes and loves them so knew that these would probably be a good slipper choice for him! I was right.. he loves them and has been wearing them since they arrived at our front door almost!
customer_reviews.author: Kpc

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I went down a half size like suggested- too small. So I just re- ordered the next whole size up
customer_reviews.author: Ojii-san

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband. At first I was very hesitant to spend this amount on slippers. But he wears them quite a bit and says they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and are true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these slippers for my grown sons and husband. They normally don’t wear slippers but they all love these! Olukai are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A definite must have
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my husband. He is in love with them and pretty much lives in them these days now that he is working from home. They are great for wearing around the house and for stepping outside to get the mail or run the garbage to the street.
customer_reviews.author: jacob r hammond

customer_reviews.title: Definit Buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves them and especially the convenience of the "convertible" back. So much so, that we sent a pair to our son for his birthday. He also was very impressed with the comfort, style & fit.
customer_reviews.author: ggirl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Great fit! I wear a 91/2 and ordered the 10, very comfortable, they do get warm but a light pair of footies takes care of the sweaty feet. Great quality, great arch support
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable slippers
customer_reviews.text: The slippers, while on the pricey side, are very well made and comfortable. The footbed is removable which is a benefit should I need/want to replace it if it wears out. The shipment from Outland USA arrived on schedule and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Cozy,and Wide!
customer_reviews.text: Like all Olukai products these slippers are hand made and feel great!! These are very warm and cozy and the medium width fits a wide width foot just fine. These are well worth the price like all Olukai products and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: david flanary

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Best slippers I've ever owned. I want to wear them constantly at home! Super soft and fit perfectly. I may consider putting some scotchguard or similar product on to protect the nubuck.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Zisko

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because he loves Olukai flip flops. He says the shoes are very comfortable and we love the look.
customer_reviews.author: NickyH

customer_reviews.title: Great casual slipper
customer_reviews.text: This slipper is a tad on the expensive side for what I'm comfortable paying for a single season of use, but the quality is excellent. Great insulation. Great fit. And you can definitely wear these outside or for an extended period outside. Pics on the product review are exactly what these slippers look like.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers but too expensive for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice slippers but too pricey. I ended up returning them but I can see the appeal. Well made and rather comfortable. Are they worth the high price? Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Best. Slippers. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot rave about these enough. Decided to pony up and buy some nicer slippers for the cold months and I was not disappointed! Material is top notch and great comfort. The flip-down heel is also great for just sliding them on in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Little

customer_reviews.title: Great suportive slipper!
customer_reviews.text: First slipper I have owned that provides good arch support. Can wear them for as long as I like and they remain comfortable and supportive. Love all my Olukai shoes. Expensive but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Read B. Mecleary

customer_reviews.title: Quality slippers
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair and fell in love so purchase these for my husband as we was due for a new pair of slippers. He absolutely loves them! Very soft but not too plush as some Ugg slippers can be. Had to order a size up from his usually shoe size as the first pair was a little tight at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Best slip on brand I know of.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even received them yet but this is the only brand I buy. This will be my 4th pair. They are true to size but forgiving because of the leather. If you get half a size off just soak em in water and wear them. They are pricey but they last way longer and look and feel better then other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Double hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who loved them so much I got a pair for my husband who wears them all day long in the house. Great buy and am so pleased I made a perfect pick for two of my best men.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable slippers/ shoes I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: wunderbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers Ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are the bomb. I am a barber and I actually wear them all day at work, they look just like shoes but are SUPER comfy !!
customer_reviews.author: Norman White

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I live in theses. My husband had a pair. I bought men’s size 8 (I’m a women’s 10) and they are great. I have a larger and wider foot then most women so I really appreciate the extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A Russi

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My hubby has wide flat feet, this brand continues to impress and one brand we can confidently buy online as we know they fit perfect! He wears a 9 wide and the 9 fit perfect, a bit spendy, but for his difficult to find good fitting shoes it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a hard time with any footwear. These are perfect! Comfortable for him & I LOVE the look. Awesome quality in this slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: they are a comfortable alternative for the winter months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, he loves them. Though they don’t offer as much support as the Olukai flops, they are a comfortable alternative for the winter months, and great for quick runs outside to get the mail.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: My husbands favorite house slippers.
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loves them. He had the UGG brand that are similar and he said hands down the Olukai were better and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Regi

customer_reviews.title: and is always talking about how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad as a Christmas present and he loves them. He wears them all the time, and is always talking about how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband's Christmas. He is VERY particular so I am delighted to report that he loves these slippers. Thank you OluKai for a wonderful product. I will recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good for long narrow low arch feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 13 for husband who wears a true 13 in length and has narrow feet with barely any arch. He loves them and wears them for most of the day working from home. They are well made and were worth the money. He has had them for 2 months now and has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V. Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are nice slippers but I don’t really care for the feel of the inside
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Won’t want to take them off
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My favorite footwear. I go to the store in these all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beat. Slippers. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 27 year old son who recently donated bone marrow & wouldn’t be at work for a while. He usually wears 11 - 11.5 an size 11 was perfect. Very well made & super comfortable He hasn’t taken them off for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend ordering 1/2 to full size smaller than regular shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: I figured I'd spend a little more on some slippers, well worth it so far. Recommend ordering 1/2 to full size smaller than regular shoe size - luckily I read this and heeded advise. I wear a 11.5 US in dress shoes, 12 in golf/sneakers, so I ordered 11 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SGS

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Olukai sandals and shoes which are my favorite summer footwear. I wear a 9.5 shoe and ordered the US M 9 as recommended and they fit perfectly. Now I have a pair of my favorite slippers!
customer_reviews.author: sawyerb

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair!
customer_reviews.text: Second Pair. I work from home most of the time so these things are on my feet all day every day. Fit is perfect and the shearling fur makes them so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Abridged too far

customer_reviews.title: Great. A bit warm.
customer_reviews.text: Super cozy. They are a bit warm and you’re feet will sweat. Have some sort of odor eater spray handy...
customer_reviews.author: sean a sikes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy i purchased these
customer_reviews.text: My first time ordering Olukai's. What a great decision. Very comfortable and warm. I ordered down a half size and they are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McNutt

customer_reviews.title: COMFY HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Trip to the Mountains to use while on the trip. Wore them in and out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Elwell

customer_reviews.title: soft, comfy and WIDE
customer_reviews.text: my dude has wide feet and these slippers are his absolute favorite. highly recommend for anyone with a wide foot. super soft interior and high quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: applesqueeze

customer_reviews.title: Walking on sunshine
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted, excellent materials ,soft and squishy removable foot bed, very comfortable. This product is very warm, not suitable for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these... so we bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these ... so we bought them in three different colors, as there is no Olukai seller in our rural town.
customer_reviews.author: Bethann Rome

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as one of my husbands xmas presents. He’s been wearing them since! Absolutely loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slipper
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands second pair! He won’t wear any other slipper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, most amazingly comfortable slippers ever! Highly recommend, recipient loves them and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: JMann

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I have ordered for my husband. He loves these and says they are super comfortable.. really top notch made
customer_reviews.author: gina baker

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect! Very comfortable and love that the heal collapses easily and they are still comfortable even with the heal down! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Cenk

customer_reviews.title: Pass for shoes enough that you could go out to the movies or whatever and not feel like you're getting looks
customer_reviews.text: most comfy slippers I've ever owned. Pass for shoes enough that you could go out to the movies or whatever and not feel like you're getting looks. Durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size larger than normal size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. He wears 10M but got the 11 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well-made ... I find myself wearing these more often than shoes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect slippers. They are very comfortable and have just ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect slippers. They are very comfortable and have just enough sole to grab the mail. The fold down section in the back is a great addition and makes them super easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmi S

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made slipper. Hubby loves them, says they are very comfortable, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: ksj

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: fits great, good support. bought for spouse for Christmas and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of slippers. I’ve had them for 2 month, and they seem to hold up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Wear a size 8.5 EE Men’s and a 9 fit perfect. Only reason I left 4/5 stars was the price! Had a gift card for amazon and scored on these or else it wouldn’t of happened! Comfortable af though! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Valued customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at it
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves them, he'd wear them everywhere if he could!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Giesseman

customer_reviews.title: Olukai Moloa Slippers Men”s
customer_reviews.text: I ordered theses slippers for my son and he said they are super comfortable, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: austinmax

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: Gift for hubby... he loves them and the quality is apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn Sally

customer_reviews.title: Anything Olukai is a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint - just like sandals and shoes -these slippers are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: David Calder

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but looks nice enough to wear out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are awesome. Very comfortable. I have some olukai shoes and they are a little smaller but they are just snug and I wouldn't buy them a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable / High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice slippers. High quality, comfortable, and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best slippers I've owned. Much more comfortable than my Uggs. I'd definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: TVO

customer_reviews.title: Go up in size! No half sizes.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his. But, just one thing..we read to go down in size (since there aren't half sizes) and it was too small. He's a 10.5 so the 11 fit great. They look so good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have had excellent luck with all OLUKAI products. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor1751

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Quality light construction very comfortable I will buy more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best slippers out there. Well worth the money. Bought a second pair for work!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen S.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite Christmas surprise! They are luxuriously nice and super comfy, he really doesn't want to take them off. They are def. for cooler weather as they are very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amy gartman

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are the first things i put on when i get home, SUPER comfy and warm, makes you feel like your walking on clouds, i will definitely order another pair, this time in (Dark Java/Dark Java) color.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best slipper ever
customer_reviews.text: Best slipper ever. Yeah, a tad expensive, but so worthwhile. I don't like cold feet in winter! These slippers are very warm, very comfortable, and the sole is unlike anything I've worn. If you want to spoil someone with a gift....this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Francis E. Tibbitts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the slipper...well really every thing they make is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and well made
customer_reviews.text: Comfy cozy I often forget I have them on and wear them out of the house
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. Warm, comfortable and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: John A

product_meta.title: OLUKAI mens 10252-3363 Moloa Slipper
product_meta.description: Slide into pure effortless island living with the laid-back luxury of the Olukai® Moloa slipper! Nubuck leather upper. Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide. Easy slip-on style with dual goring. Genuine sheepskin lining. Removable, EverFit contoured footbed with merino wool blend cover. Non-marking natural gum rubber with buffed finish. Real sheep fur has been artificially dyed and treated. Fur origin: China. Laser-etched logo detailing. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Slide into pure effortless island living with the laid-back luxury of the Olukai® Moloa slipper!
Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide.
Easy slip-on style with dual goring.

Genuine sheepskin lining. Removable, EverFit contoured footbed with merino wool blend cover. Non-marking natural gum rubber with buffed finish. Real sheep fur has been artificially dyed and treated. Fur origin: China. Laser-etched logo detailing. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
